sentences.en: A small adjustment will equalize the temperature in the two rooms.
sentences.cn: 稍作些调节就会使两间房内的温度相等.

sentences.en: Additional external resources will ease adjustment toward growth.
sentences.cn: 新增的外部资源将使这种旨在增长的调整工作稍微容易一些.

sentences.en: Adjustment is provided in the form of a needle - value or restrictor.
sentences.cn: 流量调节采用针阀或限流器.

sentences.en: Any out - of - adjustment pins can be reason for casting rejection.
sentences.cn: 如果顶钉调整不当,可能使铸件报废.

sentences.en: Investment is up by 5.7% after adjustment for inflation.
sentences.cn: 针对通货膨胀作出调整之后投资上升了5.7%。

sentences.en: It is the handwheel adjustment of the kerosene stove wick.
sentences.cn: 这是煤油炉炉芯的手轮调节处.

sentences.en: Sometimes happiness is just a matter of attitude adjustment.--Susan Gale
sentences.cn: 有时候，幸福只需转变一下自己的态度。

sentences.en: Such mechanisms allow adjustment to seasonal changes in temperature.
sentences.cn: 这种机制可用于调整温度的季节变化.

sentences.en: The 1933 Agricultural Adjustment Act had also authorized marketing agreements and orders.
sentences.cn: 1933年的农业调整法也承认市场合同和指令.

sentences.en: The arrangement of light industry in the province needs adjustment.
sentences.cn: 那个省的轻工业布局需要调整.

sentences.en: The company made an adjustment in my salary.
sentences.cn: 公司对我的薪金作了调整.

sentences.en: The dynamic of the market demands constant change and adjustment.
sentences.cn: 市场要有活力，需要不断地改变和调整。

sentences.en: The effect of the adjustment is to limit economic growth in the offending region.
sentences.cn: 调整的结果是限制了违章地区的经济增长.

sentences.en: The front end is equipped with hydraulic jacks used for grade adjustment.
sentences.cn: 前瑞安装有液压千斤顶用来调整坡度.

sentences.en: The recombine of property is the main form which realizes the strategic adjustment.
sentences.cn: 资产重组是实现这一战略性调整的主要形式。
